about.paragraph1: MaaEnd is not just a scriptâ€”it's an intelligent automation platform built on next-generation image recognition technology. Through deep learning models and real-time decision algorithms, it thinks like a human player but with machine-like precision and stability.
about.paragraph2: Open source, secure, and transparent. MaaEnd is community-driven, providing reliable logistical support for administrators worldwide. Whether on high-performance Win32 native environments or ADB-driven mobile platforms, MaaEnd delivers a consistently excellent experience.
